Headline: #26 South Shore Express, #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near South Shore Drive/80th
ShortDescription: NB 26 South Shore Express, 71 71st/South Shore  buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 83rd, Exchange. 79th and South Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express, #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 83rd, Exchange. 79th and South Shore Drive, due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/80th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Division. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Division.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
